statements: SELECT * FROM media_contacts;
SELECT contact_name, organization, email FROM media_contacts;
SELECT id, contact_name, phone_number FROM media_contacts;
SELECT organization, email FROM media_contacts WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM media_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM media_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT contact_name, organization FROM media_contacts WHERE organization LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT contact_name, email FROM media_contacts WHERE organization = 'XYZ Company' AND email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM media_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT contact_name, phone_number FROM media_contacts ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM media_contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM media_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT organization, contact_email FROM media_contacts WHERE organization = 'Company XYZ';
SELECT contact_name, coverage_title FROM media_contacts JOIN press_coverage ON media_contacts.contact_id = press_coverage.contact_id;
SELECT * FROM press_coverage WHERE coverage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM media_contacts JOIN press_coverage ON media_contacts.contact_id = press_coverage.contact_id WHERE media_contacts.contact_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM media_contacts WHERE organization = 'New York Times';

SELECT media_contacts.contact_name, press_coverage.coverage_title FROM press_coverage JOIN media_contacts ON press_coverage.contact_id = media_contacts.contact_id WHERE press_coverage.coverage_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT media_contacts.contact_name, COUNT(*) AS total_coverage_count FROM press_coverage JOIN media_contacts ON press_coverage.contact_id = media_contacts.contact_id GROUP BY media_contacts.contact_name;
SELECT * FROM media_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_contacts;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM media_contacts ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT headline, published_date, reporter_name FROM press_coverage WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE outreach_goal > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, coverage_text, reporter_name FROM press_coverage WHERE reporter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM media_contacts;
SELECT headline, published_date, coverage_text FROM press_coverage ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, outreach_goal FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE outreach_goal > 100 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT name, organization, role FROM media_contacts WHERE role = 'CEO' OR role = 'Manager' ORDER BY organization, name;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, description FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM MediaContacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM MediaContacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT coverage_title, coverage_date, coverage_source FROM PressCoverage WHERE coverage_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_status = 'Active';
SELECT contact_name, organization_name FROM MediaContacts JOIN CampaignMedia ON MediaContacts.contact_id = CampaignMedia.contact_id WHERE CampaignMedia.campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MediaContacts WHERE organization_name IS NULL;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM MediaContacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT coverage_title, coverage_source FROM PressCoverage WHERE coverage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, campaign_goal FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_status = 'active';

SELECT mc.contact_name, pc.coverage_title, c.campaign_name FROM MediaContacts mc JOIN CampaignMedia cm ON mc.contact_id = cm.contact_id JOIN PressCoverage pc ON cm.coverage_id = pc.coverage_id JOIN Campaigns c ON cm.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE pc.coverage_source = 'CNN';
SELECT * FROM MediaContacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM MediaContacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT outlet_name, location FROM MediaOutlets WHERE location LIKE 'United%';
SELECT press_id, coverage_type, source FROM PressCoverage WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM MediaContacts ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT contact_id, first_name, email FROM MediaContacts WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM PressCoverage WHERE coverage_type = 'News' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Tech Industry' LIMIT 5;
SELECT COALESCE(pc.description, 'No description available') AS press_description, mo.outlet_name FROM PressCoverage pc JOIN MediaOutlets mo ON pc.source = mo.website;
